thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Apple Takes Aim at Wireless Phone Companies
thread.title_full: Apple Takes Aim at Wireless Phone Companies - WSJ

author: Thomas Gryta
title: Apple Takes Aim at Wireless Phone Companies
text:
Apple launched a broadside Wednesday against wireless phone companies, saying it will for the first time finance iPhone sales directly to customers without requiring them to be tied to any particular carrier.
The offer, revealed along with a new line of products, marks a sharp turn in the relationship between Apple, which needs to sell tens of millions of new phones each year, and such wireless giants as AT&T Inc., and Verizon...
